title: Will Xayah or Rakan be counted as an OP champ in comparison with other ADC's and SUP's?
body: **I was just wondering if is worth it getting xayah...

replies.body: Please Riot. After all these years... Why do you make the same mistakes? These new champs  Rakan and Xayah ar so OP and unbalanced.... They ruin the game. As always ahppens with your new champs. So sad T_T
They'll be strong with good coordination between Rakan and Xayah, but I can't imagine they'll "op".
Very true (SERAS DRAGON). I do expect Riot to make some slight nerf's or changes into the following release.

Most champions are overtuned on release to account for the learning curve, so if you learn fast then the'll probs be a bit OP at launch (there are a few notable exceptions however, think Aurelion and Azir type stuff). However that being the case, most new champion also get nerfed one or two patch cycles after their release for the same reason, so it's something to consider.
I'm very excited for the upcoming Xayah and Rakan so please share some information to me. (it will be very useful).
